personalInfo.splInterest: Fishing, going to the beach, water sports, relaxing

tourBios.exmtStatus: 20th Nationwide Tour Qualifier at the 2010 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: Played in five Nationwide Tour events between 2009-2010. Best finish was T17 at the 2009 Ford Wayne Gretzky Classic. Has played in eight Hooters Tour events with two top-10 finishes. 2010: Finished T44 at the Frys.com Open, his only PGA TOUR start.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Two-time Sun Belt Conference selection in 2008-2009. Team MVP in 2008-2009. Won the Wyoming Desert Intercollegiate.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill outside of golf is catching a tuna or yellowtail then having fresh sashimi. Favorite food is sushi...Never travels without his iPod...Wears a lucky bracelet...Wants to play golf in the Olympics...Favorite golf course is Riviera CC. The one course he would like to play but never has is Augusta National. Favorite college team is the University of Miami. Favorite pro team is the Los Angeles Lakers. Favorite TV shows are "Sons of Anarchy" and "East Bound and Down." Favorite movie is "Little Rascals." Favorite entertainer is Adam Sandler...Would round out his dream foursome with Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn and Danny McBride...Loves 1970s soul and Motown music...Is involved with the charities VCA for dog rescue and adoption, Jewish Big Brother Program and A Place Called Home.
tourBios.priorYearSeason: Earned his first top-10, with a T8 at The Rex Hospital Open.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T8th in 2011 at the The Rex Hospital Open.
